title: Is it possible to get Low Priority Que lifted for me if I send a ticket with Weather Issues?
body: I live in southwest Florida and it's around the time of the year when thunderstorms come out of nowhere, it's always bright or storming at random occasions and I can't control when storms shut my power off. Is there anything I can do about this situation? I've never had issues with this kind of stuff before.

replies.body: An account will be marked with a lower priority queue only after consistent leaves; not just a single game.  In this case, I see there were a few leaves this week.  We don't reduce lower priority queues, but it's possible as a player to return to a positive standing through constant, uninterrupted play.  I hope that helps!
No, sorry. Riot will not remove penalties or enable loss prevention unless the error is on their end. The only thing you can really do is avoid playing when it looks like a thunderstorm is coming.
